title: Sami
overview: Sami is a comedy series that follows a young actress in NYC as she navigates through her daily life routine of auditioning, temp jobs, performing, dating and all of life's adventures. With support from her BFF, Sammy, and her family, Sami is strong-willed, sweet and funny. It's a throwback to the time when sitcoms were endearing and funny. There's an original song in every episode.
